scripts.app:dev: concurrently -k -n 'API,APP,ALERTS-TASK,COMMON-UTILS' -c 'green.bold,blue.bold,yellow.bold,magenta' 'nx run @hyperdx/api:dev' 'nx run @hyperdx/app:dev' 'nx run @hyperdx/api:dev-task check-alerts' 'nx run @hyperdx/common-utils:dev'
scripts.app:dev:saas: concurrently -k -n 'API,APP,OTLP-GATEWAY,ALERTS-TASK,BILLING-TASK,TELEMETRY-ANALYSIS,COMMON-UTILS' -c 'green.bold,purple.bold,blue.bold,white.bold,yellow.bold,cyan.bold,orange.bold,magenta' 'nx run @hyperdx/api:dev' 'nx run @hyperdx/app:dev' 'nx run @hyperdx/api:dev:gateway' 'nx run @hyperdx/api:dev-task check-alerts' 'nx run @hyperdx/api:dev-task calculate-data-ingestion' 'nx run @hyperdx/api:dev-task telemetry-analysis' 'nx run @hyperdx/common-utils:dev'
scripts.dev: yarn build:common-utils && dotenvx run --convention=nextjs -- docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d && yarn app:dev && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down
scripts.dev:saas: yarn build:common-utils && dotenvx run --convention=nextjs -- docker compose -f docker-compose.saas-dev.yml up -d --build && dotenvx run --convention=nextjs -- yarn app:dev:saas && docker compose -f docker-compose.saas-dev.yml down
scripts.release: npx changeset tag && npx changeset publish

packages/api/src/routers/external-api/**: sh -c 'cd packages/api && yarn run docgen && git add openapi.json'
